coreAttributes.name: Sky Dancer's String
coreAttributes.description: A string that compose the main component of a sky dancer's costume. For some reasons, it doesn't covers the wearer's breasts and ass. It is said that this string is soaked in aphrodisiacs when created, though the effects should not manifest until you wear the majority of the costume.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(guide)] [npc.her] [npc.arms] through the Sky Dancer's String as [npc.she] [npc.verb(put)] it on [npc.her] body.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(guide)] [npc2.namePos] [npc2.arms] through the Sky Dancer's String as [npc.she] [npc.verb(put)] it on [npc2.her] body.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(put)] [npc2.namePos] Sky Dancer's String on [npc2.her] body.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(shift)] [npc.her] Sky Dancer's String back on, covering [npc.her] groin.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(shift)] [npc2.namePos] Sky Dancer's String back on, covering [npc2.her] groin.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(shift)] [npc2.namePos] Sky Dancer's String back on, covering [npc2.her] groin.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(shift)] [npc.her] Sky Dancer's Panty, fully exposing [npc.her] groin.
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(shift)] [npc2.namePos] Sky Dancer's Panty, fully exposing [npc2.her] groin.
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(shift)] [npc2.namePos] Sky Dancer's Panty, fully exposing [npc2.her] groin.
